title: Do Tony and John Podesta Match Madeleine McCann Police Sketches?
subtitle: In a classic conspiracy theory trope, rumormongers "spotted" the Podesta brothers in police sketches linked to the Madeleine McCann disappearance.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Police sketches of Madeleine McCann's alleged kidnappers are a perfect match for Tony and John Podesta.
